(user 0 request): I am writing a short essay on the following topic: Should prisoners receive high-quality education in prison? Provide a response using 50 words.
(assistant response): Prisoners receiving high-quality education can be controversial. While some argue it may reduce recidivism, others prioritize victim concerns and stricter punishment.
